channel.title: CVE Feed for Cisco -- Cisco Intersight Virtual Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cisco -- Cisco Intersight Virtual Appliance

item.title: CVE-2021-34748|2024-08-04T00:19:48.190Z -- cisco -- cisco%20intersight%20virtual%20appliance
item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of Cisco Intersight Virtual Appliance could allow an authenticated, remote attacker to perform a command injection attack on an affected device. This vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by using the web-based management interface to execute a command using crafted input. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary commands using root-level privileges on an affected device.
